title.value: MAGNIFIC O: Evaluating the In-Context Learning Ability of Large Language Models to Generalize to Novel Interpretations
title.justification: The title of the paper as provided by the user.
title.quote: MAGNIFIC O: Evaluating the In-Context Learning Ability of Large Language Models to Generalize to Novel Interpretations

extractions.description: This paper introduces MAGNIFIC O, an evaluation suite designed within a text-to-SQL semantic parsing framework. It systematically analyzes the ability of Large Language Models (LLMs) to acquire novel interpretations using in-context learning by incorporating diverse tokens and prompt settings to simulate real-world complexity.

type.justification: The paper systematically analyzes the ability of LLMs through experiments and evaluation, indicating empirical methods.
type.quote: In this paper, we systematically analyse the ability of LLMs to acquire novel interpretations using in-context learning.

name.justification: The research focuses on the capabilities of large language models, which are a core area within the field of Natural Language Processing.
name.quote: However, Large Language Models (LLMs) have a knowledge cutoff and are costly to finetune repeatedly.

name.justification: The evaluation suite MAGNIFIC O is implemented within a text-to-SQL semantic parsing framework.
name.quote: To facilitate our study, we introduce MAGNIFIC O, an evaluation suite implemented within a text-to-SQL semantic parsing framework.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is to evaluate how well LLMs can acquire novel interpretations in-context.
name.quote: In this paper, we systematically analyse the ability of LLMs to acquire novel interpretations using in-context learning.

name.justification: The paper mentions that GPT-3.5-Turbo was one of the LLMs evaluated.
name.quote: We experiment with OpenAI GPT-3.5-Turbo (v0301) (Brown et al., 2020).

is_contributed.justification: GPT-3.5-Turbo is not a contribution of this paper; it is an existing model evaluated within the study.
is_contributed.quote: We experiment with OpenAI GPT-3.5-Turbo (v0301) (Brown et al., 2020).

is_executed.justification: The model was executed since the experimental results and evaluations are based on its performance.

is_compared.justification: GPT-3.5-Turbo's performance is compared with several other models within the paper.
is_compared.quote: We experiment with OpenAI GPT-3.5-Turbo (v0301) (Brown et al., 2020)
